selfunverify.name: selfunverify
selfunverify.description: Temporarily deny access to yourself on the server.

end.name: end
end.description: End date and time, or duration of access removal.

keepables.name: keepables
keepables.description: A list of channels or roles to keep access. Separate with a comma, space, or semicolon.

access.name: access
access.description: View a list of user permissions.

today.name: today
today.description: Find out whose birthday it is today.

when.name: when
when.description: The date of your birthday. (Format: yyyy-mm-dd, if you don't want a year, enter 0001 as the year).

have.name: have
have.description: Ask if I have my birthday saved?

list-keepables.name: list-keepables
list-keepables.description: List of allowable accesses when selfunverify

board.name: board
board.description: Statistics of the most active channels on the server.

clean.name: clean
clean.description: Deletes the last N messages from the channel.

channel.name: channel
channel.description: Channel where to delete messages. If the channel is not specified, the execution channel is used.

send.name: send
send.description: Post a message to a channel as a bot.

channel.name: channel
channel.description: The channel to send the message to.

content.name: content
content.description: The textual content of the message.

reference.name: reference
reference.description: A link to the message to which this message should refer.

duck.name: kachna
duck.description: Find out the current status of the U Kachničky club.

Date and time of last use.name: Date and time of last use

user.name: user
user.description: Show statistics of only one user

animated.name: animated
animated.description: Do I want to show animated emotes in the list too?

kasparek.name: kasparek
kasparek.description: He asks your mom what kind of **** you have.

base.name: base
base.description: Tell the bot in which base to greet you.

peepolove.name: peepolove
peepolove.description: Generates an image where the peepo hugs the user.

user.name: user
user.description: The user who will be in the picture. If you don't enter it, you will be there.

peepoangry.name: peepoangry
peepoangry.description: Generates an image where the peepo staring at the user.

user.name: user
user.description: The user who will be in the picture. If you don't enter it, you will be there.

message.name: message
message.description: Message to be converted. It is also possible to enter emoticons.

rectjize.name: reactjize
rectjize.description: Convert text to emoji and set as reaction.

message.name: message
message.description: Message to be converted. It is also possible to enter emoticons. Must not contain duplicate emotes/characters.

reference.name: reference
reference.description: Link to the message to be responded to.

all.name: all
all.description: Remove all user permissions from channel.

channel.name: channel
channel.description: The channel in which permissions are to be deleted.

excludedUsers.name: excludedUsers
excludedUsers.description: List of users to exclude from the process.

check.name: check
check.description: Checking the server for unnecessary permissions.

channel.name: channel
channel.description: Channel where to delete messages. If the channel is not specified, the execution channel is used.

remind.name: remind
remind.description: A reminder for a specific date

create.name: create
create.description: Create a reminder for a specific date.

who.name: recipient
who.description: Designation of the user who wishes to receive notifications

when.name: kdy
when.description: Reminder date and time. It must be in the future.

message.name: message
message.description: The message that will be sent to the user.

secret.name: secret
secret.description: No one should know about creating a reminder.

notify.name: notify
notify.description: Whether to notify the target user early.

channel.name: channel
channel.description: The channel you want to find something in.

emote.name: emote
emote.description: Submission of a proposal for an emote

emote.name: emote
emote.description: Option to design an emote based on an existing emote (from another server).

attachment.name: attachment
attachment.description: Ability to design an emote based on an image.

feature.name: feature
feature.description: Submission of a proposal for a new feature to GrillBot.

where.name: where
where.description: Get the current status of user points.

user.name: user
user.description: The user for whom you wish to show the points status. If you don't enter, yours will be displayed.
